attributes.action: Get jack straw to make a public announce David Calvert is not Jon venables
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you think its time jack straw stood up and told people David Calvert is Not Jon Venables please sign this petition!

David Calvert has been harassed over this vicious rumor even after been told Jon Venables is locked up and David Appeared on TV.

Jack Straw is sitting back protecting a killer over innocent people.  He is not putting Jon Venables in danger just by coming on TV and saying David id not Jon

Please People sign this so David and his family can have a better life!

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
